data.title: winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1912 Stock Photo
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: German dramatist and novelist Gerhart Hauptmann (1862 - 1946) - winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1912. - C0CTN2 from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
data.text:
This image could have imperfections as itâ€™s either historical or reportage.

Vintage portrait photo circa 1900 of German dramatist and novelist Gerhart Hauptmann (1862 - 1946) - winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1912. Hauptmann, whose notable works included The Weavers and The Rats, was awarded his Nobel Prize "primarily in recognition of his fruitful, varied and outstanding production in the realm of dramatic art". Photo By Bain News Service.
